hero.title: Build faster with
hero.description: Production-ready starter with authentication, email, dashboard, i18n, dark mode, and everything you need to ship fast.

features.title: Ship faster with built-in features
features.subtitle: Focus on your product, not on boilerplate. Everything is ready to go.
features.tech: Next.js 16 • React 19 • TypeScript • Tailwind • shadcn/ui • Drizzle • Better Auth

auth.title: Authentication
auth.desc: Better Auth with login, register, 2FA, social login, email verification, password recovery, account lockout, login notifications, and account deletion.

email.title: Email System
email.desc: Nodemailer with React Email templates: welcome, verification, 2FA, password reset, and login notifications.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.desc: Modern dashboard with sidebar, profile management, settings, session control, and account deletion.

i18n.title: Internationalization
i18n.desc: Multi-language support with cookie-based detection and SEO-friendly routes.

ui.title: Beautiful UI
ui.desc: shadcn/ui components with dark mode, animations, and responsive design.

database.title: Database
database.desc: Drizzle ORM with SQLite, type-safe queries, and visual studio.

security.title: Security
security.desc: Security headers, GDPR cookie consent, Turnstile captcha with auto-reset, account lockout after failed attempts, and Zod validation.

performance.title: Performance
performance.desc: Optimized builds, ISR support, and standalone mode for production.

footer.stack: shadcn/ui • Tailwind • Framer Motion • Drizzle • t3-env • i18n

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect information you provide directly, such as when you create an account or contact us. We also automatically collect certain information about your device and usage.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience, analyze traffic, and personalize content. You can manage your cookie preferences in your browser settings.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You may also object to processing or request data portability.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please contact us through our website.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using our service, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: We shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of the service.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may revise these terms at any time. By continuing to use the service after changes become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised terms.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.intro: This policy explains how we use cookies and similar technologies on our website.

what.title: What Are Cookies
what.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help the site remember your preferences and improve your experience.

types.title: Types of Cookies We Use
types.content: We use essential cookies for site functionality, preference cookies to remember your settings, and analytics cookies to understand how you use our site.

manage.title: Managing Cookies
manage.content: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling certain cookies may affect site functionality.
